tool_description: This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database.
name: RC Verification
title: RC Verification

api_list.name: GET task result
api_list.description: This GET call will you give the details of the RC. You will need to pass the request ID received in the first API call to get the results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks?request_id=your_req_id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks?request_id=your_req_id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
